Articles.Content:
After a good amount of thinking on a new rocket, I thought I should do my own ARAR. So after successful testing its capabilities, I wanted to share it out to the world. From Kaboom (a.k.a Misinterpreted) Inc, I bring you the ARAR rocket.

**So what is its purpose?**

It's purpose is to bring 3 kerbals to an asteroid, rendezvous, and return. Now, in my test, it didn't have enough fuel to slow it down to meet the asteroid, but that was because I tried to get there faster and that is what I got

**What are its features?**

It has about 1780 m/s delta-v after the transfer to an asteroid (or planet, you can go to Duna or Eve) 2 mini engines on the hab module for the impatient, 2 solar panels and 4 batteries for power, capacity for 11 kerbals, and its own launcher that sorta looks like the SLS

**Pics?**

NO! JK Here they are.

[http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=463451079](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=463451079)

[http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=463457285](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=463457285)

**Download**

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/uz15ckxc950sy2i/ARAR%20Rocket%20Mk1.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/uz15ckxc950sy2i/ARAR%20Rocket%20Mk1.craft?dl=0)

Happy rendezvousing!
